titleStmt.title: Proclamation allowing the free transporting of victual from one shire to another, and the importation of forraign victual free of custom, and twenty shilling Scots for each imported boll thereof.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Intentional blank spaces left in text.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the ninth day of June, and of our reign the eleventh year, 1699.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot. Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
